CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Percent_Match__c = 0,ISBLANK(Percent_Match__c)) , IMAGE('/img/samples/stars_000.gif','1 Star'), IF( Percent_Match__c < 0.19 , IMAGE('/img/samples/stars_100.gif','1 Star'), IF( Percent_Match__c < 0.39, IMAGE('/img/samples/stars_200.gif','2 Stars'), IF( Percent_Match__c < 0.59, IMAGE('/img/samples/stars_300.gif','3 Stars'), IF( Percent_Match__c < 0.79, IMAGE('/img/samples/stars_400.gif','4 Stars'), IF( Percent_Match__c <= 1, IMAGE('/img/samples/stars_500.gif','5 Stars'),''))))))
CustomField.label: Rating
